mapper.insert: insert into comment, comment_article_id, comment_user_id, comment_content, comment_like_count, comment_created_time values (#{commentArticleId}, #{commentUserId}, #{commentContent}, #{commentLikeCount}, #{commentCount}, #{commentCreatedTime})
mapper.select: select comment_id, comment_article_id, comment_user_id, comment_content, comment_like_count, comment_count, comment_created_time from comment where comment_id = #{commentId}

select comment_id, comment_article_id, comment_user_id, comment_content, comment_like_count, comment_count, comment_created_time from comment where comment_article_id = #{commentArticleId} order by comment_created_time desc
select comment.*, user.avatar, user.nickname from comment inner join user where comment_article_id = #{commentArticleId} and user_id = comment_user_id order by comment_created_time desc
